Company Name: The Mediterranean and Gulf Insurance and Reinsurance Co (8030)
Description: Mediterranean and Gulf Cooperative Insurance and Reinsurance (known as: Medgulf) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2007. Medgulf operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Consumer Electronics and Property and Casualty Insurance. Medgulf is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 2006.
